DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety tolerability etoricoxib diclofenac sodium treatment osteoarthritis knee hip six week period .
DOC.criteria: Patient least 40 year old diagnose osteoarthritis knee hip Has history treatment NSAIDs positive therapeutic benefit Agree limit alcohol intake less 7 drink per week avoid unusual strenuous activity Females able child must negative urine pregnancy test Has rheumatoid arthritis , lupus , Paget 's disease affect study joint , Wilson 's disease History acute ligament meniscus damage study joint ( knee hip ) within past 2 year arthroscopic surgery affected study joint past 6 month Requires joint replacement
